about_the_game:
A collection of GIFT-EXP boosting items including:

“GIFT-EXP +1” - All the allies receive 1 Gift-EXP point.
“GIFT-EXP +2” - All the allies receive 2 Gift-EXP points.
“GIFT-EXP +4” - All the allies receive 4 Gift-EXP points.

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby.

Spend your GIFT-EXP points via the Setup\Gifts menu from the Lobby.
detailed_description:
A collection of GIFT-EXP boosting items including:

“GIFT-EXP +1” - All the allies receive 1 Gift-EXP point.
“GIFT-EXP +2” - All the allies receive 2 Gift-EXP points.
“GIFT-EXP +4” - All the allies receive 4 Gift-EXP points.

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby.

Spend your GIFT-EXP points via the Setup\Gifts menu from the Lobby.
name: Lost Dimension: GIFT-EXP Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: A collection of GIFT-EXP boosting items including: “GIFT-EXP +1”, “GIFT-EXP +2” and “GIFT-EXP +4”.
